attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: request the government Create  an independent body ,with real powers, to  investigate complaints raised by the public against the police.A totally independent body selected from  a wide spectrum of the public ranging from judges to unskilled workers. The findings of that body to be published   in a clear and transparent ways.It is requested that such a body replaces the IPCC

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
